meta.Title: WITH HINTS FROM THE HEADLINES [New York Times, Sunday, January 17, 1943]

across.question: At right angles to a ship's keel.
Former coin of German East Africa.
Word meaning O. K. among bomber crews.
Cause to become separated in flight.
Center of Allied struggle in Tunisia.
Founder of dynasty of French kings.
Commander of U. S. Fleet in Solomons area.
Athenian astronomer of Fifth Century B. C.
Place in Caucasus where Nazis were turned back.
U. S. battleship damaged at Pearl Harbor.

down.question: Recently appointed leader of House of Commons.
Poem published 1845 in N. Y. Mirror.
